activities: Providing users of website with information or products requested by the user, providing information on extent of use by user, providing customized product and service information, and allowing users to voluntarily participate in mailings, sweepstakes, promotions or other events. For registered customers, we provide product or service updates, information and alerts. Information may also be disclosed as required by law or to protect and defend our property rights in and to our products or the security and safety of our users and website. We may also collect and process personal information from our employees located in various EU Member countries, and transfer such personal data to the corporate office located in the US for internal purposes in accordance with established Human Resources policies and practices and in compliance with the Privacy Policy.
contacttitle1: Vice President, Chief Legal Counsel & Global Privacy Officer
corpofftitle1: Senior Vice President, Global Human Resources
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, on-line, manually processed data, Human Resources data
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
